Text: ***Note the windows 7 USB/DVD tool will work with windows 8 just because it says windows 7 doesn't mean it wont work, and FYI i have used this exact method numerous times without error if you have problems let me know.

Under the systems tab in control panel it says that my Windows is activated but in the taskbar a notification comes up from the action center telling me that I have to activate my Windows. Is it supposed to be like that?
Thanks for the up!
brodde87 when you click activate windows on the action center it should take you to a page that says windows is activated if so just turn off that notification in action center.
Is it possible to install updates with this version?
yes you can install all updates but if there are any updates hidden already do not restore them
